requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If it runs Steam, it can run Roads of Rage. If your OS is outdated you can still download Roads of Rage from Steam and launch separately. Achievements are saved onto your savefile even if they aren't unlocked on Steam MacOS. We highly recommend playing on Windows, or using Steam's Remote Play to play on a Windows machine from MacOS.
